articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The company at the heart of the Coldplay 'kiss cam' scandal has released a video featuring the ex-wife of Chris Martin.
articles.title: Astronomer's 'clever' PR move embracing CEO scandal - featuring Gwyneth Paltrow

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Almost half of UK adults do not pay into a private or workplace pension - some of them tell us why.
articles.title: Pensions: 'Why I'm one of millions of UK adults not paying in'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The first AI-generated model to appear in the pages of Vogue is seen in an advert for Guess.
articles.title: What Guess's AI model in Vogue means for beauty standards

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: It will also be easier to open new pubs in disused shops under licensing reforms planned by the government.
articles.title: Pubs and venues to be protected from noise complaints

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Residents just 30km away from Athens have fled their homes, as Greece's temperatures are forecast to reach 44C on Sunday.
articles.title: Greece battles wildfires, evacuating residents near Athens

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US president will again play a round at Turnberry before meeting the EU Commission president for trade talks.
articles.title: Trump back on the golf course for day two of Scottish visit

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A new documentary series tells the story of now-disgraced evangelical movement the Jesus Army.
articles.title: Jesus Army: Investigating one of the UK's most abusive cults

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: James Kenny said The Killers and Wet Leg were playing his festival, but that was never the case.
articles.title: 'Fantasist' promised music stars for festival that never happened

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: At least 31 people were killed, many of them schoolchildren, when a fighter jet crashed into a school in Dhaka.
articles.title: Dhaka crash: 'A sound I've never heard - then the jet flew over my head'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: As he golfs in Scotland, the US president talks to the Thai and Cambodian leaders about a ceasefire.
articles.title: Thailand and Cambodia thank Trump for mediation, but shelling continues
